name: Free 2D Platforming Character
description:
Hello,

This was built for a 2D platforming RPG that didn't get past beta. We made this because we love ninjas. We put a lot of work into it, and hope that it can help you with your projects. This character has a lot of animations, but please keep in mind that we didn't necessarily use every frame in the final version of our game (wall jumping was a good example). We really hope you like this asset.   <3

Dimensions: 256x256 (each frame)

Animations include:

Idle

Run

Jump

Attack 1

Attack 2  (these 3 attacks were designed to be made in quick succession)

Attack 3

Slide

Wall Jump

Sheath Sword

Death

License Permissions:

You can use this asset in a commercial or personal project. You can modify this asset to suit your project. You cannot sell/redistribute this asset.
